text:
After build clean; build (Updated to revision 307273). log in as 'alice' to the
default publication.
If you try to 'Edit with BXE' any page, the bitflux editor is shown but you
cannot change any text (nor add any more text). This is both trying to edit an
existing page and a new one.
creator: aturetta@bestunion.it
andreas@apache.org
text:
I can't confirm the problem (LCR 371588).
Would you mind trying again after an SVN update?
Please reopen if you still experience the problem.
creator: andreas@apache.org
